document.full_text: research in motion has given up more ground to apple and google in the hypercompetitive u.s. smartphone market, a report shows, while two brokerages cut their price targets for the blackberry maker on concerns it can no longer keep pace.
document.title: rim loses more u.s. market share to apple, google
lines_and_colors: research in motion has given up more ground to apple and google in the hypercompetitive u.s. smartphone market, a report shows, while two brokerages cut their price targets for the blackberry maker on concerns it can no longer keep pace.
